message.name: ERR_LEGALACTION_FV_END_DATE_EARLIER_THAN_START_DATE
message.locale: The End Date, %1s must be on or after the Start Date, %2s.

message.name: ERR_LEGALACTION_FV_START_DATE_EARLIER_THAN_CURRENT_DATE
message.locale: The Start Date, %1s must be on or after today.

message.name: ERR_LEGALACTION_XRV_LEGAL_NAME_ALREADY_EXISTS
message.locale: The specified legal action is already exists.Please select other name.

message.name: ERR_LEGALACTION_XRV_CATEGORY_NAME_ALREADY_EXISTS
message.locale: The specified legal category is already exists.Please select other name.
